entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
